name: Phidippides
body:
You've spent hours training for your next marathon. Your shoes are the best. Your watch tracks all your miles.

So why are you still calculating your pace using a dated performance prediction calculator?

My goal is simple - to give you the best possible pace prediction for your course, conditions and training. 

Check back soon...

Created by @johnstantongeddes
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
